00052 #ifdef __SSE__
00053 inline int test_bb_group4(__m128 *bb_group, const Isect *isec)
00054 {
00055     const __m128 tmin0 = _mm_setzero_ps();
00056     const __m128 tmax0 = _mm_set_ps1(isec->dist);
00057 
00058     float start[3], idot_axis[3];
00059     copy_v3_v3(start, isec->start);
00060     copy_v3_v3(idot_axis, isec->idot_axis);
00061 
00062     const __m128 tmin1 = _mm_max_ps(tmin0, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[0]], _mm_set_ps1(start[0]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[0])) );
00063     const __m128 tmax1 = _mm_min_ps(tmax0, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[1]], _mm_set_ps1(start[0]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[0])) );
00064     const __m128 tmin2 = _mm_max_ps(tmin1, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[2]], _mm_set_ps1(start[1]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[1])) );
00065     const __m128 tmax2 = _mm_min_ps(tmax1, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[3]], _mm_set_ps1(start[1]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[1])) );
00066     const __m128 tmin3 = _mm_max_ps(tmin2, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[4]], _mm_set_ps1(start[2]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[2])) );
00067     const __m128 tmax3 = _mm_min_ps(tmax2, _mm_mul_ps( _mm_sub_ps( bb_group[isec->bv_index[5]], _mm_set_ps1(start[2]) ), _mm_set_ps1(idot_axis[2])) );
00068     
00069     return _mm_movemask_ps(_mm_cmpge_ps(tmax3, tmin3));
00070 }
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 /*
00074  * Determines the distance that the ray must travel to hit the bounding volume of the given node
00075  * Based on Tactical Optimization of Ray/Box Intersection, by Graham Fyffe
00076  *  [http://tog.acm.org/resources/RTNews/html/rtnv21n1.html#art9]
00077  */
00078 static int rayobject_bb_intersect_test(const Isect *isec, const float *_bb)
00079 {
00080     const float *bb = _bb;
00081     
00082     float t1x = (bb[isec->bv_index[0]] - isec->start[0]) * isec->idot_axis[0];
00083     float t2x = (bb[isec->bv_index[1]] - isec->start[0]) * isec->idot_axis[0];
00084     float t1y = (bb[isec->bv_index[2]] - isec->start[1]) * isec->idot_axis[1];
00085     float t2y = (bb[isec->bv_index[3]] - isec->start[1]) * isec->idot_axis[1];
00086     float t1z = (bb[isec->bv_index[4]] - isec->start[2]) * isec->idot_axis[2];
00087     float t2z = (bb[isec->bv_index[5]] - isec->start[2]) * isec->idot_axis[2];
00088 
00089     RE_RC_COUNT(isec->raycounter->bb.test);
00090     
00091     if(t1x > t2y || t2x < t1y || t1x > t2z || t2x < t1z || t1y > t2z || t2y < t1z) return 0;
00092     if(t2x < 0.0 || t2y < 0.0 || t2z < 0.0) return 0;
00093     if(t1x > isec->dist || t1y > isec->dist || t1z > isec->dist) return 0;
00094     RE_RC_COUNT(isec->raycounter->bb.hit);  
00095 
00096     return 1;
00097 }

00100 template<class Tree> static void bvh_add(Tree *obj, RayObject *ob)
00101 {
00102     rtbuild_add( obj->builder, ob );
00103 }

00105 template<class Node>
00106 inline bool is_leaf(Node *node)
00107 {
00108     return !RE_rayobject_isAligned(node);
00109 }

00111 template<class Tree> static void bvh_done(Tree *obj);

00113 template<class Tree>
00114 static void bvh_free(Tree *obj)
00115 {
00116     if(obj->builder)
00117         rtbuild_free(obj->builder);
00118 
00119     if(obj->node_arena)
00120         BLI_memarena_free(obj->node_arena);
00121 
00122     MEM_freeN(obj);
00123 }

00125 template<class Tree>
00126 static void bvh_bb(Tree *obj, float *min, float *max)
00127 {
00128     if(obj->root)
00129         bvh_node_merge_bb(obj->root, min, max);
00130 }

00133 template<class Tree>
00134 static float bvh_cost(Tree *obj)
00135 {
00136     assert(obj->cost >= 0.0);
00137     return obj->cost;
00138 }

00142 /* bvh tree nodes generics */
00143 template<class Node> static inline int bvh_node_hit_test(Node *node, Isect *isec)
00144 {
00145     return rayobject_bb_intersect_test(isec, (const float*)node->bb);
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 template<class Node>
00150 static inline void bvh_node_merge_bb(Node *node, float *min, float *max)
00151 {
00152     if(is_leaf(node))
00153     {
00154         RE_rayobject_merge_bb( (RayObject*)node, min, max);
00155     }
00156     else
00157     {
00158         DO_MIN(node->bb  , min);
00159         DO_MAX(node->bb+3, max);
00160     }
00161 }

00165 /*
00166  * recursively transverse a BVH looking for a rayhit using a local stack
00167  */
00168 template<class Node> static inline void bvh_node_push_childs(Node *node, Isect *isec, Node **stack, int &stack_pos);
00169 
00170 template<class Node,int MAX_STACK_SIZE,bool TEST_ROOT,bool SHADOW>
00171 static int bvh_node_stack_raycast(Node *root, Isect *isec)
00172 {
00173     Node *stack[MAX_STACK_SIZE];
00174     int hit = 0, stack_pos = 0;
00175         
00176     if(!TEST_ROOT && !is_leaf(root))
00177         bvh_node_push_childs(root, isec, stack, stack_pos);
00178     else
00179         stack[stack_pos++] = root;
00180 
00181     while(stack_pos)
00182     {
00183         Node *node = stack[--stack_pos];
00184         if(!is_leaf(node))
00185         {
00186             if(bvh_node_hit_test(node,isec))
00187             {
00188                 bvh_node_push_childs(node, isec, stack, stack_pos);
00189                 assert(stack_pos <= MAX_STACK_SIZE);
00190             }
00191         }
00192         else
00193         {
00194             hit |= RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)node, isec);
00195             if(SHADOW && hit) return hit;
00196         }
00197     }
00198     return hit;
00199 }

00202 #ifdef __SSE__
00203 /*
00204  * Generic SIMD bvh recursion
00205  * this was created to be able to use any simd (with the cost of some memmoves)
00206  * it can take advantage of any SIMD width and doens't needs any special tree care
00207  */
00208 template<class Node,int MAX_STACK_SIZE,bool TEST_ROOT>
00209 static int bvh_node_stack_raycast_simd(Node *root, Isect *isec)
00210 {
00211     Node *stack[MAX_STACK_SIZE];
00212 
00213     int hit = 0, stack_pos = 0;
00214         
00215     if(!TEST_ROOT)
00216     {
00217         if(!is_leaf(root))
00218         {
00219             if(!is_leaf(root->child))
00220                 bvh_node_push_childs(root, isec, stack, stack_pos);
00221             else
00222                 return RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)root->child, isec);
00223         }
00224         else
00225             return RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)root, isec);
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         if(!is_leaf(root))
00230             stack[stack_pos++] = root;
00231         else
00232             return RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)root, isec);
00233     }
00234 
00235     while(true)
00236     {
00237         //Use SIMD 4
00238         if(stack_pos >= 4)
00239         {
00240             __m128 t_bb[6];
00241             Node * t_node[4];
00242             
00243             stack_pos -= 4;
00244 
00245             /* prepare the 4BB for SIMD */
00246             t_node[0] = stack[stack_pos+0]->child;
00247             t_node[1] = stack[stack_pos+1]->child;
00248             t_node[2] = stack[stack_pos+2]->child;
00249             t_node[3] = stack[stack_pos+3]->child;
00250             
00251             const float *bb0 = stack[stack_pos+0]->bb;
00252             const float *bb1 = stack[stack_pos+1]->bb;
00253             const float *bb2 = stack[stack_pos+2]->bb;
00254             const float *bb3 = stack[stack_pos+3]->bb;
00255             
00256             const __m128 x0y0x1y1 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb0), _mm_load_ps(bb1), _MM_SHUFFLE(1,0,1,0) );
00257             const __m128 x2y2x3y3 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb2), _mm_load_ps(bb3), _MM_SHUFFLE(1,0,1,0) );
00258             t_bb[0] = _mm_shuffle_ps( x0y0x1y1, x2y2x3y3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2,0,2,0) );
00259             t_bb[1] = _mm_shuffle_ps( x0y0x1y1, x2y2x3y3, _MM_SHUFFLE(3,1,3,1) );
00260 
00261             const __m128 z0X0z1X1 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb0), _mm_load_ps(bb1), _MM_SHUFFLE(3,2,3,2) );
00262             const __m128 z2X2z3X3 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb2), _mm_load_ps(bb3), _MM_SHUFFLE(3,2,3,2) );
00263             t_bb[2] = _mm_shuffle_ps( z0X0z1X1, z2X2z3X3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2,0,2,0) );
00264             t_bb[3] = _mm_shuffle_ps( z0X0z1X1, z2X2z3X3, _MM_SHUFFLE(3,1,3,1) );
00265 
00266             const __m128 Y0Z0Y1Z1 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb0+4), _mm_load_ps(bb1+4), _MM_SHUFFLE(1,0,1,0) );
00267             const __m128 Y2Z2Y3Z3 = _mm_shuffle_ps( _mm_load_ps(bb2+4), _mm_load_ps(bb3+4), _MM_SHUFFLE(1,0,1,0) );
00268             t_bb[4] = _mm_shuffle_ps( Y0Z0Y1Z1, Y2Z2Y3Z3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2,0,2,0) );
00269             t_bb[5] = _mm_shuffle_ps( Y0Z0Y1Z1, Y2Z2Y3Z3, _MM_SHUFFLE(3,1,3,1) );
00270 #if 0
00271             for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
00272             {
00273                 Node *t = stack[stack_pos+i];
00274                 assert(!is_leaf(t));
00275                 
00276                 float *bb = ((float*)t_bb)+i;
00277                 bb[4*0] = t->bb[0];
00278                 bb[4*1] = t->bb[1];
00279                 bb[4*2] = t->bb[2];
00280                 bb[4*3] = t->bb[3];
00281                 bb[4*4] = t->bb[4];
00282                 bb[4*5] = t->bb[5];
00283                 t_node[i] = t->child;
00284             }
00285 #endif
00286             RE_RC_COUNT(isec->raycounter->simd_bb.test);
00287             int res = test_bb_group4( t_bb, isec );
00288 
00289             for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
00290             if(res & (1<<i))
00291             {
00292                 RE_RC_COUNT(isec->raycounter->simd_bb.hit);
00293                 if(!is_leaf(t_node[i]))
00294                 {
00295                     for(Node *t=t_node[i]; t; t=t->sibling)
00296                     {
00297                         assert(stack_pos < MAX_STACK_SIZE);
00298                         stack[stack_pos++] = t;
00299                     }
00300                 }
00301                 else
00302                 {
00303                     hit |= RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)t_node[i], isec);
00304                     if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;              
00305                 }   
00306             }
00307         }
00308         else if(stack_pos > 0)
00309         {   
00310             Node *node = stack[--stack_pos];
00311             assert(!is_leaf(node));
00312             
00313             if(bvh_node_hit_test(node,isec))
00314             {
00315                 if(!is_leaf(node->child))
00316                 {
00317                     bvh_node_push_childs(node, isec, stack, stack_pos);
00318                     assert(stack_pos <= MAX_STACK_SIZE);
00319                 }
00320                 else
00321                 {
00322                     hit |= RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)node->child, isec);
00323                     if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;
00324                 }
00325             }
00326         }
00327         else break;
00328     }
00329     return hit;
00330 }
00331 #endif

00333 /*
00334  * recursively transverse a BVH looking for a rayhit using system stack
00335  */
00336 #if 0
00337 template<class Node>
00338 static int bvh_node_raycast(Node *node, Isect *isec)
00339 {
00340     int hit = 0;
00341     if(bvh_test_node(node, isec))
00342     {
00343         if(isec->idot_axis[node->split_axis] > 0.0f)
00344         {
00345             int i;
00346             for(i=0; i<BVH_NCHILDS; i++)
00347                 if(!is_leaf(node->child[i]))
00348                 {
00349                     if(node->child[i] == 0) break;
00350                     
00351                     hit |= bvh_node_raycast(node->child[i], isec);
00352                     if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;
00353                 }
00354                 else
00355                 {
00356                     hit |= RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)node->child[i], isec);
00357                     if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;
00358                 }
00359         }
00360         else
00361         {
00362             int i;
00363             for(i=BVH_NCHILDS-1; i>=0; i--)
00364                 if(!is_leaf(node->child[i]))
00365                 {
00366                     if(node->child[i])
00367                     {
00368                         hit |= dfs_raycast(node->child[i], isec);
00369                         if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;
00370                     }
00371                 }
00372                 else
00373                 {
00374                     hit |= RE_rayobject_intersect( (RayObject*)node->child[i], isec);
00375                     if(hit && isec->mode == RE_RAY_SHADOW) return hit;
00376                 }
00377         }
00378     }
00379     return hit;
00380 }
00381 #endif
00382 
00383 template<class Node,class HintObject>
00384 void bvh_dfs_make_hint(Node *node, LCTSHint *hint, int reserve_space, HintObject *hintObject)
00385 {
00386     assert( hint->size + reserve_space + 1 <= RE_RAY_LCTS_MAX_SIZE );
00387     
00388     if(is_leaf(node))
00389     {
00390         hint->stack[hint->size++] = (RayObject*)node;
00391     }
00392     else
00393     {
00394         int childs = count_childs(node);
00395         if(hint->size + reserve_space + childs <= RE_RAY_LCTS_MAX_SIZE)
00396         {
00397             int result = hint_test_bb(hintObject, node->bb, node->bb+3);
00398             if(result == HINT_RECURSE)
00399             {
00400                 /* We are 100% sure the ray will be pass inside this node */
00401                 bvh_dfs_make_hint_push_siblings(node->child, hint, reserve_space, hintObject);
00402             }
00403             else if(result == HINT_ACCEPT)
00404             {
00405                 hint->stack[hint->size++] = (RayObject*)node;
00406             }
00407         }
00408         else
00409         {
00410             hint->stack[hint->size++] = (RayObject*)node;
00411         }
00412     }
00413 }

00416 template<class Tree>
00417 static RayObjectAPI* bvh_get_api(int maxstacksize);

00419 
00420 template<class Tree, int DFS_STACK_SIZE>
00421 static inline RayObject *bvh_create_tree(int size)
00422 {
00423     Tree *obj= (Tree*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(Tree), "BVHTree" );
00424     assert( RE_rayobject_isAligned(obj) ); /* RayObject API assumes real data to be 4-byte aligned */   
00425     
00426     obj->rayobj.api = bvh_get_api<Tree>(DFS_STACK_SIZE);
00427     obj->root = NULL;
00428     
00429     obj->node_arena = NULL;
00430     obj->builder    = rtbuild_create( size );
00431     
00432     return RE_rayobject_unalignRayAPI((RayObject*) obj);
00433 }
